ai.summary: Meal Beach is a short, easy coastal hike in the UK, covering about 1 km along flat beach terrain and offering simple scenery suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat beach terrain with sand and small pebbles; sections may be firm wet sand near the shoreline and occasional soft patches inland. Tidal conditions can affect the route.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide times and weather before heading out. Stay on the designated path where possible. Wear sturdy footwear suitable for sand and pebbles. Bring water, sun protection, and a light layer. Be mindful of waves, changing water levels, and wildlife. Supervise children and avoid sensitive wildlife areas.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; winter visits are possible but conditions can be windy, cold, and less pleasant.
